thread.title: How to Mount an Executive Comeback: Try a Mix of Spin and Candor

author: Joann S. Lublin
title: How to Mount an Executive Comeback: Try a Mix of Spin and Candor
text:
Getting bounced from a high-powered job can be painful—and permanent. But in today’s tight labor market, some top managers are finding ways to rebound.
Executives who make successful comebacks often restore their professional credibility by taking charge of their story and changing how others view their forced departure, leadership specialists and executive recruiters say.
